author: Samina Shaikh
text:
Your contributions, blessings, wishes, and regards will be the only thing that can save her life.

Read More: https://t.co/Xf1tEDaH8v

Donate Here: https://t.co/u11mL5NTsN

author: Samina Shaikh
text: and is undergoing treatment at KEM Hospital. According to the doctor she needs to be operated for Bone Marrow Transplant. The overall treatment is costing us Rs.20,00,000/- which is a very huge amount for us to afford. We are now appealing to humanity for assistance. (Contd..)

author: Samina Shaikh
text:
It’s for a friend who’s looking for help: (Thread…)

My Sister's Life Could Be Saved by a Bone Marrow Transplant, Please Help!

My name is Jeena and I am raising funds for my sister Beena Fernandes who is suffering from Aplastic Anemia
(Contd..)

author: Samina Shaikh
text: Rocky, Ramika Sen & Adheera : Their roles are so powerful that this movie completely stands on their enigmatic performances . Watched #KGF2 once again, @TheNameIsYash is too good! @TandonRaveen’s dialogue - ‘Powerful ppl come from powerful places’ is epic! 🙌🏻 @duttsanjay https://t.co/5BZOsasG35

author: Samina Shaikh
text: We have been bumping into each other while watching movies! It’s so good to see #AhanShetty once again at my favourite theatre & talking about movies. Both have been watching different 🎥 like the fact that as an actor, he’s so humble & grounded just like his dad @SunielVShetty https://t.co/Qv7aGbYvWT

author: Samina Shaikh
text: #365daysThisDay wasn’t as good as the first one! #MichelleMorrone’s character looked lost in this one unlike the #365Days Massimo wasn’t as charming this time, though I’m interested to know if Laura will exist in the 3rd one!This time- the baby gurl isn’t lost, the baby boy is! https://t.co/k8VlP6x2dR

author: Samina Shaikh
text: Not a progressive statement from his end, look at the country’s current state! We still fight & then we think we are progressing 🙌🏻 Sad state of affairs!

author: Samina Shaikh
text: Must read #RajThackeray’s statement on ‘social issue’, definitely didn’t come out like one. This’ll excite the uneducated audience to rather continue fighting with each other! (Today’s Jodhpur incident is one such example!) https://t.co/DCPbE1Y8Hg

author: Samina Shaikh
text: Just 5 minutes away from my house, there is mandir & masjid both. During school days, I’ve been to Jain temples with my friend Dimple & they would play Aartis which were loud enough & even now that’s the case, no one raises such concerns- but his statements are anti-social https://t.co/g8x7RX6noV

author: Samina Shaikh
text: Shows clearly why we are doomed! The discrimination all the time clearly shows how things are in our country at this moment. Lowering the decibels - good decision, teaching them a lesson by playing hanuman chalisa - offending someone’s religious belief! And then ‘social issue’ https://t.co/oySWCPax20

author: Samina Shaikh
text: On one end, #RajThackeray is saying it’s a social issue, on the other hand by asking Hindus to play Hanuman Chalisa on loudspeakers - he is making it a religious issue rather. Also, all this while INDIA was a democratic country, going by his entire statement- it doesn’t feel like https://t.co/ShIgtl5uRY

text: Amazon is coming up with 40 new OTT shows. This seems to be a tough competition for Netflix. So many I’ve already watched on #Amazon which are brilliant ones!

author: Samina Shaikh
text: Look who’s back in our lives! 🧐😏 Touchwood, tested negative yet again! Worries me a lot (never got it, never wish to get it) #GoCoronaGo https://t.co/Ifnt0GgXp3

author: Samina Shaikh
text: The very first reaction I had after watching Anant Vidhat was about his role in #Mai on #Netflix 🤪 Dangerous AF! When it comes to @divyenndu - his character #Munna is loud on the internet. Had a lovely chat with #MereDeshKiDharti team today, interview coming 🔜 https://t.co/fYlkkBXdxV

author: Samina Shaikh
text: Women don’t get the top profile easily. As it’s said - the grass is greener on the other side. Likewise, even if a girl is well qualified with her work/ideas, she’ll always struggle to get a better profile. Happens in a lot of companies across India. https://t.co/5Qemd2kqqa

author: Samina Shaikh
text: It is also because women aren’t respected in a lot of companies till date. They’re considered the weaker section most of the times. Paid less, made to work more. Men are always paid more than women, data supports the same. Mansplaining affects the work environment all the more… https://t.co/PcvrxNtUI3

text: Long day ahead…Guess the celebs I am interviewing today! 😋🤔 #tuesdaymotivations #TuesdayFeeling https://t.co/uiw5jxJ6C1

text: Hey @letsblinkit the app is meant to deliver the respective food items in 10 minutes. It shows 22 minutes which is still understandable, however now it shows it will come tomorrow. I wouldn’t need it tomorrow pls. Request you to kindly cancel the order. Thanks https://t.co/BWBcrosOOw
